ORIGAM Documentation : Filter Set Filter

Created by Tomáš Vavrda on Oct 02, 2014

This element allows you to define a filter in a filter set on an existing data structure's entity. Only entities inside the data structure can be filtered.

Attributes

EntitySelects one of the data structure entities in this data structure.
FilterAllows you to choose one of the entity filters which are defined in the data entity.
